entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%

Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023
